design_philosophy.visual_style: Soft Pastels, Minimalist, Nature-Inspired, High-End Spa

usage.h1: font-serif text-5xl md:text-7xl font-light tracking-tight text-primary-900
usage.nav: font-sans text-sm font-medium tracking-widest uppercase text-slate-500 hover:text-primary-600 transition-colors

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary/20 hover:border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-all duration-300 px-8 py-3 rounded-full font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.outline: border border-slate-200 hover:border-primary hover:text-primary transition-colors px-6 py-2 rounded-full

cards.service_tile: bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 shadow-[0_10px_40px_-10px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)] hover:shadow-[0_20px_60px_-15px_rgba(159,135,196,0.15)] transition-all duration-500 border border-slate-50 hover:border-primary/20 group
cards.feature_card: bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/60 rounded-xl p-6 hover:bg-white/80 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 transition-all

navigation.header: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100/50 transition-all duration-300
navigation.link: text-sm font-medium uppercase tracking-widest text-slate-500 hover:text-primary transition-colors relative after:content-[''] after:absolute after:left-0 after:bottom-[-4px] after:w-0 after:h-[2px] after:bg-primary after:transition-all hover:after:w-full

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain or noise overlay at 2-3% opacity on solid backgrounds to add organic feel.

admin_dashboard.sidebar: bg-white border-r border-slate-100 w-64 hidden md:block
admin_dashboard.header: bg-white border-b border-slate-100 h-16 flex items-center px-6 justify-between
admin_dashboard.card: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm rounded-xl p-6
admin_dashboard.table_header: text-xs text-slate-400 uppercase bg-slate-50/50 font-medium tracking-wider

status_badge.success: bg-green-50 text-green-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badge.pending: bg-amber-50 text-amber-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badge.error: bg-red-50 text-red-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of public/index.html.
3. TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to extend the theme with the colors and border radius defined above. Use the CSS variables method for dynamic theming.
4. CSS: Replace src/index.css content with the CSS variables defined in 'css_variables'.
6. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Hero section (1 large, 2 small).
7. ADMIN: Create a separate layout for admin routes (/admin) with a sidebar and topbar.
8. AUTH: Implement JWT handling in axios interceptors.
9. IMAGES: Use the provided asset URLs. Do not use placeholders.
10. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 or Primary-900.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state.
Use generous padding (py-20) for sections to create a 'spa-like' breathing room.
Mobile responsiveness is critical - stack grids to single column on mobile.
